**Title: Request for Proposal (RFP) - Virtual Assistant**
==============================================

**Reference Number:** MX-42818932734
**Publication Date:** 25th July 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** 15th September 2023, 16:00 hours CST

**Introduction:**
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) invites qualified contractors to submit a proposal for a Virtual Assistant to provide support to its employees working from diverse locations and devices.

**Background:**
Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, AAFC has adopted hybrid work arrangements, resulting in increased turnover and growth, with new employees requiring support. The current 'self-service' model is no longer effective, and a centralized support system is required to provide efficient tier 0 and tier 1 support.

**Objectives:**
The selected contractor will provide a Virtual Assistant solution that enables employees to access information, resources, and support from a centralized platform. The solution must integrate with existing Microsoft Teams capabilities and provide an immediate answer or forward requests to the appropriate team for resolution.

**Key Requirements:**

* Centralized support platform for employee inquiries, issues, and requests
* Integration with Microsoft Teams to leverage existing capabilities
* Ability to provide immediate answers or forward requests to the appropriate team
* Scalable solution to support the needs of a dynamic organization

**Evaluation Criteria:**

* Proposal content
* Technical capabilities
* Implementation plan
* Budget and pricing
* References and experience

**Proposal Guidelines:**

* Submissions must be made through the MERX electronic bidding system
* Proposals submitted after the closing date will be rejected
* AAFC reserves the right to negotiate with one or multiple contractors before awarding a contract

**Contact Information:**
Dhruv Bhatt, Procurement and Vendor Manager, AAFC
Procurement@fcc-fac.ca, 000-000-0000

**Notice URL:**
https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2561650863/abstract?language=EN
https://www.merx.com/public/solicitations/2561650863/abstract?language=FR

**Document Attachments:**
Not applicable

**Language of Document:**
English and French

**Priority of Documents:**
In case of discrepancies, the RFP document takes precedence. Original translations into English can be obtained at no charge. For further information on the content of this RFP, in either English or French, please contact Dhruv B
